name: Onet Connect Pet
description:
Onet Connect Pet is a classic Onet - Connect-2 puzzle game
You will need to remove 2 pet with the same kind which can be connected within 3 lines.

Features:
- Classic game play
- HD graphic.
Game play: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b-m5XgsWxM8&feature=youtu.be
Have fun of playing Onet Connect Pet and discover legendary pet!
